Polar_expression: will be offset by a restructuring charge in the fourth quarter

Target: the size of the expected gain

text: Company officials also said that any gain from the sale of Westinghouse 's 55 % stake in its transmission and distribution venture with the Swiss firm of Asea Brown Boveri will be offset by a restructuring charge in the fourth quarter . The executives did n't disclose the size of the expected gain .
